attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to petition to deport all non british criminals currently in our prisons,at over 10,000 and a cost of £330 million i think enough is enough,send these criminals back to their home land to serve their sentences immediately.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
